Title: – New Product Launch: Hitachi Room Air Conditioner “Shirokuma-kun” Premium X Series
Summary: Bosch Home Comfort Japan, Inc. is launching new models of the Hitachi Room Air Conditioner “Shirokuma-kun” Premium X Series equipped with a new feature called “LAB Control”, which enables both energy saving and enhanced comfort. The new “Shirokuma-kun” Premium X Series includes 10 models and will be available on the market starting October 31, 2025.
